title: Survey Design and Implementation for Teacher Performance Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations in educational statistics, educational assessment methodologies, LMS (Learning Management System) experience
context.additional_context: Data-driven decision-making education for enhancing math teachers' competencies

learning_goals: They can independently design surveys explaining the four core components of teacher performance (lesson planning, teaching-learning process management, assessment, and instructional material development).
They can statistically evaluate teacher performance levels by collecting and analyzing large-scale survey data on the LMS platform.
They can propose tailored educational improvement plans by analyzing gender- and career-based differences in teacher performance.

resources: LMS Platform (Integrated Zoom Webinar + LMS System)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
